data.title: Gauri Pradhan to feature in Sony SAB's next with husband Hiten Tejwani
data.meta_description:
Former beauty queen and actress Gauri Pradhan is all set for her comeback in television, and that too with her husband Hiten Tejwani. The power couple will soon be sharing the screen space in Sony SAB's next.

As per a news daily, the duo will be part of the new project of Producer Siddharth P Malhotra’s Alchemy Films banner Pashima, for Sony SAB.

According to the sources, reportedly Nishant Malkhani plays the lead in the show. Apart from these, the show also stars Krissann Barretto and Akshita Singh in pivotal roles.

Fans are excited to watch Hiten and Gauri play integral roles in the show. Earlier, in their on-screen chemistry is much-loved in shows such as Kutumb, and Kyunki Saas Bhi Kabhi Bahu Thi.

On the work front, Gauri was last seen in A winter tale at Shimla with Indranil Sengupta, and Deepraj Rana. The film is a story about a mature sensible love story where a man meets his long lost love after two decades. The rekindled affair could be ruinous, for the jealous husband, who is a DIG Police Officer, a brute with a unenviable reputation.

ALSO READ:

Tarini Kalingarayar shares #photodump of her London trip with Kalidas Jayaram

Ragini Dwivedi starrer ‘Sheela’ to hit theatres today!
